item.title: Private Arrival Transfer: Buffalo Niagara Airport to Niagara Falls, Ontario
item.description: Forget the long lines and confusion associated with finding transportation from the many Buffalo Niagara International Airport arrivals. Skip the taxis and shuttles and travel with confidence—and without worry—by scheduling a private luxury vehicle. Choose from a 3-person sedan, a 6-passenger SUV, or a van that seats up to nine travelers. Sit back and relax as the vehicle travels from the airport to a Niagara Falls accommodation.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer: Buffalo Niagara Airport to Niagara Falls, Ontario

item.title: History Ride: The Best of Buffalo by Bike
item.description: Learn about Buffalo's diverse history while getting some exercise and having fun on this bicycle tour. Explore the revamped Canalside district, visit the heart of African American Buffalo, learn about the construction of the Erie Canal, understand Buffalo's role in the Civil Rights Movement, and more. You'll cover a lot of ground in a couple of action-packed hours.

image.alt: History Ride: The Best of Buffalo by Bike

item.title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site Admission and Guided Tour
item.description: Explore the fascinating history of Buffalo during its heyday on this guided tour of the location where Theodore Roosevelt became the 26th President of the United States in 1901. Your guide will make history come alive with stories about the President and his times, and you’ll get the chance to immerse yourself in the interactive displays of the beautifully restored historic site.

image.alt: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site Admission and Guided Tour

item.title: The Wing Ride: The Hidden History of Chicken Wings Food Tour
item.description: There's a lot more to buffalo wings that you might expect. This small-group food tour takes you on a tasting journey of some of Buffalo's best chicken wings. On the way, you'll dive deep into the history of the city's famous dish and explore how Buffalo was shaped by race dynamics as your guide reveals its history, from its working class origins to present-day resurgence.

image.alt: The Wing Ride: The Hidden History of Chicken Wings Food Tour

item.title: ROUNDTRIP Ground Transfer Buffalo Niagara Int Airport (BUF)-Niagara Falls Canada
item.description: Eliminate the guesswork out of getting to and from Niagara Falls with this round-trip transfer service. Your driver meets you at the baggage claim area of Buffalo Niagara International Airport (BUF) and provides a swift transfer to Niagara Falls, Canada. When your vacation is over, receive the same service in reverse for your departure flight.

image.alt: ROUNDTRIP Ground Transfer Buffalo Niagara Int Airport (BUF)-Niagara Falls Canada

item.title: Buffalo Airport to OR from Canadian destinations (Niagara Falls)
item.description: Simplify your travel between Buffalo Niagara Airport and Niagara Falls, Ontario with this handy private transfer service. As well as being met at the airport–which is always a relief after a long flight–you’ll be transported over the border to Canada. Avoid the hassle of self-driving or the discomfort of sharing a shuttle with strangers with this easy private service.

image.alt: Buffalo Airport to OR from Canadian destinations (Niagara Falls)

item.title: Private Transfer from Buffalo Intl, Airport (BUF) to Niagara Falls Canada
item.description: Arrive in Niagara Falls in style with this private transfer service from Buffalo. Meet your driver at Buffalo Niagara International Airport (BUF) and head to your vehicle for a swift journey across the Canadian border to your accommodation in Niagara Falls, Canada. This service can be booked as a one-way transfer or a round-trip.

image.alt: Private Transfer from Buffalo Intl, Airport (BUF) to Niagara Falls Canada

item.title: Round-Trip Private-Safe Transfer Between Buffalo Airport & Niagara Falls Canada
item.description: Relax and travel in comfort knowing your transportation from Buffalo Niagara International Airport is all taken care of. You can head straight to Niagara Falls, Canada in this private, comfortably air-conditioned vehicle. No need to worry if your flight is late or early—this service will track your flight from the moment of departure so there are no surprises.

image.alt: Round-Trip Private-Safe Transfer Between Buffalo Airport & Niagara Falls Canada

item.title: Private Tour: Niagara Falls Sightseeing from US Side
item.description: Customize a Niagara Falls sightseeing experience on this private, guided tour of the area’s main attractions and landmarks. Hop in a vehicle of choice — a luxury sedan, van or SUV — and get ready to experience everything the Niagara Falls area has to offer, from Niagara Falls State Park to Niagara-on-the-Lake and everything in between. Let a knowledgeable guide lead the way to all the must-see attractions. Pick-up and drop-off in Niagara Falls USA only.

image.alt: Private Tour: Niagara Falls Sightseeing from US Side

item.title: Waterfront Ride: Outer Harbor History Bike Tour
item.description: Get active while sightseeing on a fun half-day cycle tour of Buffalo’s outer harbor. Follow cycle paths beside the Buffalo River, which joins up with Lake Erie. Stop at the impressive grain silos and learn about Buffalo’s prosperous history as well as modern-day regeneration efforts. See sights that you might otherwise miss.

image.alt: Waterfront Ride: Outer Harbor History Bike Tour

item.title: Private Custom Niagara Falls, Canada Scenery Tour from Buffalo,NY
item.description: Streamline your border crossing and sightseeing from Buffalo to Ontario, Canada with a private driver service. You’ll be picked up from your hotel and assisted across the international border. In Canada, you can check out your choice of attractions around Niagara Falls and Niagara-on-the-Lake, including the famous falls and wineries if you like.

image.alt: Private Custom Niagara Falls, Canada Scenery Tour from Buffalo,NY

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer: Buffalo Niagara International Airport to Niagara Falls, New York
item.description: Start your trip to Niagara Falls off on the right foot and pre-book a private transfer service. Meet your driver at the Buffalo Niagara International Airport (BUF) arrivals hall and head directly to your accommodation in Niagara Falls, New York. This door-to-door service is a no-brainer for those who want a seamless start to their trip.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer: Buffalo Niagara International Airport to Niagara Falls, New York

item.title: Private Transfer from Buffalo NY to Toronto
item.description: Simplify your travel across the US–Canada border with a private transfer between Buffalo, NY and Toronto, Ontario. You can be picked up from Buffalo Niagara International Airport or your hotel in the Buffalo area, and dropped in Toronto or Mississauga. There’s no need to self-drive across the international border or wait on a bus with strangers. Save time and stress with a private service.

image.alt: Private Transfer from Buffalo NY to Toronto

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer: Buffalo Niagara International Airport to Buffalo, NY
item.description: Forget about fighting traffic and looking for a parking spot at the Toronto Pearson International Airport (YYZ). Skip all the headaches associated with getting to the airport and travel with confidence — and without worry — by scheduling a private car. Choose from a four-person sedan, a six-passenger SUV, or a van that seats up to eight people. Sit back and relax as a professional chauffeur drives from any Niagara Falls accommodation to the airport.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer: Buffalo Niagara International Airport to Buffalo, NY

item.title: Self-Guided Buffalo Scavenger Hunt: Roaming Buffalo
item.description: Whether you’re a tourist visiting town for the first time or a born-and-bred local, you’ll get to know Buffalo in a fun and interactive new way during this smartphone-based scavenger hunt. Race against the clock and put your trivia skills to the test as you explore the city together to solve challenges. Self-led games are ideal for birthdays, team-building events, or just a fun activity on the go.

image.alt: Self-Guided Buffalo Scavenger Hunt: Roaming Buffalo

item.title: Private Custom Niagara Falls, Canada Winery Tour from Buffalo,NY
item.description: Go beyond Niagara’s classic waterfalls and discover local vineyards on this private tour from Buffalo, New York. Meet your driver at your accommodation and cross the Canadian border to begin your customized tour. Choose from several wineries, breweries, cideries, and small-batch distilleries and customize your day based on your group’s interests. A valid passport and visa are required for this tour.

image.alt: Private Custom Niagara Falls, Canada Winery Tour from Buffalo,NY

item.title: Private Departure Transfer to Buffalo Airport (BUF)
item.description: Streamline your departure from Buffalo International Airport with a private transfer. You’ll be picked up from your hotel and transferred to the airport in good time for your flight. Avoid the risk of being late as you wait for unreliable taxis or slow shared transfers. Transfers are available 24 hours a day so you can enjoy a stress-free departure experience.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer to Buffalo Airport (BUF)

item.title: 5 Hour Niagara Falls USA Tour from Buffalo
item.description:
Your tour of Niagara Falls, USA begins with pick up directly from your downtown hotel in Buffalo, NY.
After a quick drive to Niagara Falls, your guide will bring you to your first attraction, a boat ride on the famous Maid of the Mist. Before you board, you’ll have a chance to check out the view from the Prospect Point Observation Tower, located directly above the boarding site for the Maid of the Mist boat tour.
The next stop on your tour is a visit to Goat Island which connects to Terrapin Point and Luna Island as well.
After your Goat Island visit, your guide will take you to Cave of the Winds where you will descend 175 ft. into the Niagara Gorge before heading out onto a series of walkways leading to the “hurricane deck” - only a few feet away from the Bridal Veil Falls.
Your final stop on the tour will be a visit to Whirlpool State Park. At the end of your Niagara Falls tour, your guide will return you to your downtown Buffalo accommodation.

image.alt: 5 Hour Niagara Falls USA Tour from Buffalo

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer from Buffalo Airport (BUF)
item.description: Save yourself the hassle of waiting for taxis or the discomfort of shared transfers with strangers when you book a private arrival transfer from Buffalo International Airport to central Buffalo and nearby areas. Whether it’s your first time in Buffalo or you’re a resident, this service streamlines the arrival process, saving you time and stress after a long flight.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer from Buffalo Airport (BUF)

item.title: E-Bikes Riding in Buffalo New York
item.description: On this experience, you’ll take out a new Rad Runner 2 and enjoy the city from an electric bike. E-bikes, for the newcomer, are bicycles with motors that provide a boost, also called a pedal assist. Whether you want to cruise all the way to Delaware Park, to the East Side Train Terminal, or for the ambitious, head all the way up to Niagara Falls, I’ve got you covered! Great for families and sightseeing during your stay of Buffalo, NY.

image.alt: E-Bikes Riding in Buffalo New York

item.title: Luxury Buffalo Brewery Tour
item.description:
On the eve of prohibition Buffalo was home to over 20 breweries. Today you can sip yourself through more than double (nearly 50 craft breweries here). If you love beer, this is the tour for you. We can help weave your way through Buffalo’s old waterfront or explore some newly renovated industrial buildings of the past which now have become home of our great craft brewery community.
Experience between 4-5 breweries over the 4 hour tour.

image.alt: Luxury Buffalo Brewery Tour

item.title: Transfer Buffalo Niagara International Airport BUF to Niagara Falls,Canada
item.description: Streamline your arrival in the Niagara region with a handy private transfer between Buffalo Niagara International Airport, USA and Niagara Falls, Canada. After collecting your luggage, your driver will meet you and transfer you across the international border. Relax in your comfortable vehicle if there are any border delays. As this is a door-to-door service you’ll be dropped at your location of choice in Niagara Falls.

image.alt: Transfer Buffalo Niagara International Airport BUF to Niagara Falls,Canada

item.title: Shared Airport Transfer: Buffalo Niagara International Airport to Niagara Falls NY
item.description: Simplify your arrival in the Niagara region with this economical small-group transfer from Buffalo Niagara International Airport to your accommodation in Niagara Falls, NY. A driver will be waiting at the airport with a sign with your name on. You’ll be taken directly to Niagara Falls feeling relaxed and ready for some sightseeing. Return transfers are provided at the end of your stay.

image.alt: Shared Airport Transfer: Buffalo Niagara International Airport to Niagara Falls NY

item.title: Buffalo Bills Football Game Ticket at Highmark Stadium
item.description:
Step into Highmark Stadium, with its picturesque setting near the Lake Erie waterfront, offering great views and a fan-friendly layout. Home of the Buffalo Bills, the stadium has undergone recent renovations, enhancing amenities and comfort while maintaining that classic NFL vibe.
Allow yourself to be awed by one of the NFL’s most thrilling quarterbacks, Josh Allen. The Bills are a current powerhouse in the NFL, you’ll be treated to elite football at Highmark Stadium.
Just as thrilling as the football on the field is the famous Bills fanbase - “Bills Mafia”. Renowned for their fervour, loyalty and ability to get the party going, the electrifying atmosphere inside and out of the stadium won't be topped!
Join in with the legendary tailgating scene hours before kickoff, grab some buffalo wings, share drinks and enjoy one of the best game day experiences in the NFL. Whether you're a solo traveler, with friends or family, you'll be welcomed into Bills Mafia in this trip of a lifetime!

image.alt: Buffalo Bills Football Game Ticket at Highmark Stadium
